verses.name: Proverbs 14:29
verses.text: He that is slow to wrath is of great understanding: but he that is hasty of spirit exalteth folly.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:30
verses.text: A sound heart is the life of the flesh: but envy the rottenness of the bones.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:31
verses.text: He that oppresseth the poor reproacheth his Maker: but he that honoureth him hath mercy on the poor.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:32
verses.text: The wicked is driven away in his wickedness: but the righteous hath hope in his death.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:33
verses.text: Wisdom resteth in the heart of him that hath understanding: but that which is in the midst of fools is made known.
